EmailTemplate.name: 10K Bourbon Trail Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your 10K Dreamforce Bourbon Trail Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!CampaignMember.FirstName}!
We’re so excited that you’ll be attending the 10K Bourbon Trail event! Save this email for all of the pertinent details about the event.
Who:
{!CampaignMember.Contact}
What:
10K Bourbon Trail party, where you can taste rare bourbons, drink craft cocktails, and commiserate with some of the top Salesforce influencers around the globe.
When:
Monday, November 6th 6:30PM - 9:30 PM Add to your Google Calendar Add to other calendars
Where:
Barrel Room 415 Sansome St San Francisco, CA 94111
Why:
Because you want to have a great time!
What to bring:
Just yourself and a picture ID
This invitation is only good for you! While we can't promise there will be any spots available for others to attend, if you'd like to request a +1 please respond to this email with the name and email address of the person you'd like to invite. Also, should your plans to attend change for any reason, please send us a note to let us know.
We can’t wait to share an evening of memory making with you!
Cheers!
The 10K Team
